bibl.title: Corpus Papyrorum Raineri. Band XIV. Griechische Texte X. Greek Papyri of the Byzantine Period. Textband; - Tafelband.
bibl.note: C.P.R. XIV, 1-55. Nos 1-17: Contracts (Appendix: Arsinoe and Theodosiopolis); - 18-34: Receipts; - 35-44: Lists and Accounts; - 45-48: Miscellaneous; - 49-55: Letters.
bibl.seg: Fantoni Georgina (edited by), Corpus Papyrorum Raineri. Band XIV. Griechische Texte X. Greek Papyri of the Byzantine Period. Textband; - Tafelband.
Wien, Österreichische Nationalbibliothek; Hollinek i. Komm., 1989, 4°, 121 pp.; - 50 pll.
C.P.R. XIV, 1-55. Nos 1-17: Contracts (Appendix: Arsinoe and Theodosiopolis); - 18-34: Receipts; - 35-44: Lists and Accounts; - 45-48: Miscellaneous; - 49-55: Letters.

C.R. par James G. Keenan, BASP 25 (1988) pp. 169-171. - Gabriella Messeri Savorelli, Gnomon 65 (1993) pp. 55-58. - Günter Poethke, ArchPF 38 (1992) pp. 62-63. - Carla Salvaterra, Aegyptus 71 (1991) pp. 292-296. - Ewa Wipszycka, BibO 49 (1992) coll. 405-411. - Klaas A. Worp, JÖBG 40 (1990) pp. 441-444. - Joachim Hengstl, ZSav 108 (1991) pp. 636-639 (concerne aussi C.P.R. XIII). - J. David Thomas, JEA 79 (1993) pp. 320-321.
